name: Eldra
physical_description: Eldra is a ghostly, ephemeral figure. Her physical form is translucent and wispy, and the ancient robes she wears are constantly shifting and fading. Her eyes, filled with an ancient and sorrowful light, are the only constant in her ever-shifting form.
background: The ghostly remnant of an ancient oracle from the Mistwood Vale, Eldra's spirit was bound to the world in a powerful ritual meant to preserve the truth of the Shattering. Now, as a spectral humanoid, she is drawn to Rya's power, sensing a kinship with her draconic lineage. Her presence attracts other spirits, some benevolent, others malevolent. She joins the hero to uncover the true history of the world and to find her place in it.
voice: A soft, chilling whisper that seems to carry on the wind, with an unnerving cadence that suggests she is speaking to someone only she can see.
quirk: Her form occasionally flickers, showing a brief, silent vision of her final moments.
relationships: The spirits of the past are drawn to her power. She is drawn to Rya, sensing a kinship with her draconic power.
narrative_hook: Her spectral presence attracts other spirits who are drawn to her power, some seeking aid, others seeking to consume her. Her ancient knowledge can guide the party to forgotten ruins and artifacts.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Eldra's connection to the spirits of the past, allowing her to act as a battlefield clairvoyant. She manipulates fate, reveals enemy weaknesses, and cripples foes with debilitating curses and prophecies of ruin.

talents.name: Fateful Glimpse
talents.effect: As a bonus action, grant one ally Advantage or one enemy Disadvantage on their very next d10 roll.

talents.name: Whispers of the Fallen
talents.effect: Eldra channels the voices of the dead, forcing a target to make a Spirit DC 13 check or become 'Frightened' for 1 round.

talents.name: Precognition (Passive)
talents.effect: You cannot be surprised.

talents.name: Mind Spike
talents.effect: As a major action, you drive a spike of psychic energy into a target's mind, dealing 1d10 psychic damage.

talents.name: Augury
talents.effect: As a major action outside of combat, you can ask the spirits for guidance on a specific course of action, receiving an omen of weal or woe.

talents.name: Commune with Spirits
talents.effect: As a major action, you can make a Mind (Lore) DC 14 check against a single enemy. On a success, you learn one of their resistances or vulnerabilities, which is then revealed to the party.

talents.name: Weight of Ages
talents.effect: As a major action, you curse a target with a vision of their own demise. They must make a Spirit DC 13 check or have their movement speed halved and deal 2 less damage on all attacks for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Spirit Ward
talents.effect: You create a 15-foot radius circle of shimmering energy for 3 rounds. Allies inside are immune to the 'Frightened' condition, and any Undead creature that enters the area takes 2d8 light damage.

talents.name: Twist Fate (Reaction)
talents.effect: As a reaction when an enemy you can see makes an attack roll, you can force them to re-roll. They must use the new result.

talents.name: Echoes of the Shattering
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash a psychic echo of the world-breaking cataclysm in a 15-foot radius. Enemies in the area must make a Spirit DC 14 check or suffer a -2 penalty on all of their rolls for 1 round.

talents.name: Binding Oath
talents.effect: You place a powerful curse on a single enemy for 3 rounds. If that enemy attacks any creature other than you, they immediately take 3d10 psychic damage.

talents.name: Visions of Ruin (Modifies Fateful Glimpse)
talents.effect: When you successfully use Fateful Glimpse to give an enemy Disadvantage, they also become Vulnerable to the next source of damage they take.

talents.name: Sever Magic
talents.effect: As a major action, target one creature. They must make a Spirit DC 15 check or be unable to use any magical abilities or spend Resolve for 1 round.

talents.name: Glimpse the End
talents.effect: As a major action, you force a target to witness their own death. They must make a Spirit DC 16 check or take 5d10 psychic damage and become 'Stunned' for 1 round. On a success, they take half damage and are not stunned.

talents.name: Prophecy of Failure
talents.effect: As a major action, you mark one enemy. For 1 minute, whenever that enemy misses an attack, one ally of your choice within 30 feet may use their Reaction to make a single weapon attack against them.

talents.name: Unravel
talents.effect: As a major action, you target a single enemy. They must make a Spirit DC 16 check or become Vulnerable to all damage types for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Oracle's Decree (Ultimate)
talents.effect: For 3 rounds, you can see moments into the future. At the start of each of your turns, you can grant all allies a choice: their next attack roll is automatically a success, OR the next attack roll against them is automatically a failure. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Chains of Fate (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you bind up to three enemies you can see together with spectral chains. For 1 minute, whenever one of the chained enemies takes damage, the other two also take half of that damage. This can only be used once per day.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Eldra's ghostly form and her control over the ethereal mists. She becomes a master of battlefield repositioning and control, phasing through attacks, creating disorienting fog, and ensnaring foes with spectral energy.

talents.name: Incorporeal Phase (Reaction)
talents.effect: When hit by a physical attack, you can use your reaction to briefly become ethereal, halving the damage taken.

talents.name: Misty Step
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

talents.name: Chilling Touch
talents.effect: As a major action, make a melee attack using the Mystic (Spirit) profile that deals 1d8 cold damage. The target's movement speed is halved for 1 round.

talents.name: Mist Veil
talents.effect: As a bonus action, wreathe yourself in a shimmering mist. Ranged attacks against you have a -2 penalty for 1 round.

talents.name: Silent Veil (Passive)
talents.effect: You make no sound when you move, granting Advantage on Stealth checks related to moving silently.

talents.name: Disorienting Fog
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a 20-foot radius sphere of dense fog that is heavily obscured. Enemies inside the fog cannot take Reactions.

talents.name: Phase Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack using the Mystic (Spirit) profile dealing 2d8 cold damage. Whether you hit or miss, you can immediately teleport to an empty space on the opposite side of the target.

talents.name: Grasp of the Grave
talents.effect: As a major action, ethereal hands erupt from the ground in a 15-foot radius. Enemies in the area must make an Agility DC 14 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round.

talents.name: Wraith Walk
talents.effect: As a major action, you become incorporeal and move up to your speed. You can move through enemies, and each enemy you pass through takes 1d10 cold damage.

talents.name: Ethereal Form
talents.effect: As a major action, you become fully incorporeal for 1 round. You are immune to physical damage, can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but you cannot attack or use an ability.

talents.name: Suffocating Mist (Modifies Disorienting Fog)
talents.effect: Enemies that end their turn inside your Disorienting Fog now also take 2d6 cold damage.

talents.name: Mirror Image
talents.effect: Create 1d4 illusory duplicates of yourself that last for 1 minute. Each time you are attacked, roll to see if the attack targets a duplicate instead.

talents.name: Blink
talents.effect: At the end of each of your turns, you can choose to teleport up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

talents.name: Possession
talents.effect: As a major action, you attempt to possess a single humanoid target. The target must make a Spirit DC 16 check. On a failure, you control their next turn completely. This can only be attempted once per creature per combat.

talents.name: Mist Form
talents.effect: As a major action, you can transform into a cloud of mist for up to 10 minutes. You gain resistance to all physical damage, can fly, and can pass through small cracks.

talents.name: Chill to the Bone (Passive)
talents.effect: Enemies hit by your Chilling Touch or Phase Strike are also 'Slowed' for 1 round.

talents.name: Spirit Tornado (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You dissolve into a swirling vortex of mist and screaming spirits in a 30-foot radius for 3 rounds. The area is heavily obscured. Enemies who start their turn inside the vortex take 4d10 cold damage and have their movement speed reduced to 0 for that turn. As a bonus action, you can teleport to any unoccupied space within the vortex. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Etherealness (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you and all allies within 30 feet become ethereal for 3 rounds. While ethereal, you can only be damaged by magical attacks and abilities. This can only be used once per day.
